Package statgraphics.util

Provides classes for generating the data suitable for the plots, creating, displaying and saving the plots in different formats.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
DataCreator This class contains a collection of utility methods for creating the required datasets for generating statistical plots.
Plot2DFactory This class contains a collection of utility methods for creating some 2D statistical plots.
Plot3DFactory This class contains a collection of utility methods for creating some 3D statistical plots.
PlotFrame Consturcts a frame on which the file menu, the buttons for saving the image in a variety of formats and the plot can be placed.
PlotFrameFactory Creates the plot frame for statistical analysis.
SavePlot This class contains a collection of utility methods for saving a plot to a file in different formats, including PNG, JPEG, PDF, and SVG.
 

Enum Summary
Argument The enumerated arguments.
PlotType The enumerated plot types.
 

Package statgraphics.util Description

Provides classes for generating the data suitable for the plots, creating, displaying and saving the plots in different formats.
